testcase.name: testFetchWeatherData
testcase.system-out:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Server: openresty Date: Mon, 18 Mar 2024 10:55:33 GMT Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8 Content-Length: 485 Connection: keep-alive X-Cache-Key: /data/2.5/weather?q=london Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST
